errors.invalid_enum_value: Invalid enum value. Expected {- options}, received '{received}'

errors.not_multiple_of: Number must be a multiple of {multipleOf}

array.inclusive: Array must contain at least {minimum} element(s)
array.not_inclusive: Array must contain more than {minimum} element(s)

number.inclusive: Number must be greater than or equal to {minimum}

date.exact: Date must be exactly {- minimum, datetime}
date.inclusive: Date must be greater than or equal to {- minimum, datetime}
date.not_inclusive: Date must be greater than {- minimum, datetime}

array.inclusive: Array must contain at most {maximum} element(s)
array.not_inclusive: Array must contain less than {maximum} element(s)

number.inclusive: Number must be less than or equal to {maximum}

date.exact: Date must be exactly {- maximum, datetime}
date.inclusive: Date must be smaller than or equal to {- maximum, datetime}
date.not_inclusive: Date must be smaller than {- maximum, datetime}

verify-email.subject: Verify your email address
verify-email.main-text: Thank you for starting the process of creating a new ZeroX Pos account. We want to make sure that this is really you. Please click the button below to continue with the account creation process. If you don't want to create an account, you can ignore this message.
verify-email.caution-text: ZeroX Project will never send you an email asking you to reveal or verify your password, credit card or banking account number.
verify-email.helper-text: If the button is not working you can click the link below.

reset-password.subject: Reset your password
reset-password.main-text: Hi {name}, Someone recently requested a password change for your {sitename} account. If this was you, you can set a new password here:
reset-password.info-text: This link is valid for 1 hour. If you don't want to change your password or didn't request this, just ignore and delete this message.
reset-password.title: Reset your password {sitename}

delete-account.main-text: Hello {name}, Someone has just requested for the deletion of your {sitename} account. account. If this is you, you can use the button below to proceed.
delete-account.subject: Account Deletion {sitename}
delete-account.info-text: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
delete-account.title: Account Deletion
